Detailed Description

Abstract interface for the Nearest Neighbor search algorithm.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void brics_3d::INearestNeighbor::findNearestNeighbors ( vector< float > *  query,
std::vector< int > *  resultIndices,
unsigned int  k = 1 
) [pure virtual]
Parameters:
[in]queryVector that will be queried to the data. Please make sure that it has the dame dimensionality as the data, set with setData(). Otherwise an exception is thrown.
[out]resultIndicesReturns the indices of the $k$ nearest neighbors with respect to the data point cloud. If the nearest neighbor exceeds the maximum distance the returned vector will be empty.
[in]kSets how many nearest neighbors will be searched.

NOTE: setData() must be invoked before.

Implemented in brics_3d::NearestNeighborANN, brics_3d::NearestNeighborFLANN, and brics_3d::NearestNeighborSTANN.

virtual void brics_3d::INearestNeighbor::findNearestNeighbors ( vector< double > *  query,
std::vector< int > *  resultIndices,
unsigned int  k = 1 
) [pure virtual]
Parameters:
[in]queryVector that will be queried to the data. Please make sure that it has the dame dimensionality as the data, set with setData(). Otherwise an exception is thrown.
[out]resultIndicesReturns the indices of the $k$ nearest neighbors with respect to the data point cloud. If the nearest neighbor exceeds the maximum distance the returned vector will be empty.
[in]kSets how many nearest neighbors will be searched.

NOTE: setData() must be invoked before.

Implemented in brics_3d::NearestNeighborANN, brics_3d::NearestNeighborFLANN, and brics_3d::NearestNeighborSTANN.

virtual void brics_3d::INearestNeighbor::setData ( vector< vector< float > > *  data) [pure virtual]

Set the data.

Parameters:
[in]dataData matrix. The inner vector forms the dimension of the search space and must be constant.

Implemented in brics_3d::NearestNeighborANN, brics_3d::NearestNeighborFLANN, and brics_3d::NearestNeighborSTANN.
